attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies an instance of this object.

attribute.name: AssessmentResultComponentGroupRefId
attribute.desc: The assessment result component group (test or assessment) associated with the set of listed learners.

element.name: CreationDateTime
element.desc: Date/time assignment is created.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: Value supplied by publishing vendor/supplier.

element.name: SchoolGroupRefId
element.desc: Optional reference to the class group(s) to which this will be/are drawn.

element.name: WorkforcePersonalRefId
element.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies the teacher or staff member who created the learner set.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID that uniquely identifies an instance of this object.

element.name: Name
element.desc: The identifier used within the publishing application.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: Optional reference to the school associated with the administration.

element.name: SupplierName
element.desc: The supplier/originator/designer/owner of the described component.

element.name: Description
element.desc: Longer text describing features of the component.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies an instance of this object.

attribute.name: AssessmentSessionRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the assessment session in which the responses were collected.

element.name: Name
element.desc: Name of the assessment/test/taken.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The identifier used for this entity within the publishing application.

element.name: SupplierName
element.desc: The supplier/originator/designer/owner of the described component grouping.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of this aspect or subtest.

element.name: Name
element.desc: The name used to identify this component or aspect.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The identifier used within the publishing application.

element.name: ShortDescription
element.desc: Shorter description used for column headers in marksheets, etc.

element.name: Description
element.desc: Longer text describing features of the component.

element.name: AssessmentResultGradeSetRefId
element.desc: The gradeset associated with the component or aspect.

element.name: ComponentType
element.desc: Defines the associated result format.

element.name: ResultQualifier
element.desc: Defines the format or type of result(s) awarded.

element.name: AssessmentMethod
element.desc: The method or format of the Assessment.

element.name: SupplierName
element.desc: The supplier/originator/designer/owner of the aspect.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies a component group.

element.name: Name
element.desc: Name of the assessment/test/goal.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The identifier used for this entity within the publishing application.

element.name: SupplierName
element.desc: The supplier/originator/designer/owner of the described component grouping.

element.name: AssessmentResponseComponentRefId
element.desc: A SIF identifier for an assessment result component.

element.name: AssessmentResultComponentRefId
element.desc: A SIF identifier for an assessment result component.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of this grade set.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally assigned identifier for this grade set.

element.name: Name
element.desc: The descriptive identifier for the grade set.

element.name: Notes
element.desc: Explanatory/usage notes for grade set.

element.name: SupplierName
element.desc: The supplier/originator/designer/owner of the gradeset.

attribute.name: AssessmentLearnerSetRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the set of people the session refers to.

element.name: SessionDate
element.desc: The date at which the activity takes place.

element.name: Activity
element.desc: The activity which takes place.

element.name: Status
element.desc: The current status of the session.

element.name: AssessmentSessionRefId
element.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies the session associated with the result.

element.name: Subject
element.desc: A subject area associated with this assessment component or aspect.

element.name: Title
element.desc: The visual representation of the grade.

element.name: Description
element.desc: The meaning of the grade.

element.name: RankOrder
element.desc: The rank position of the grade within the set where the highest value is assumed to be the best. While duplicate ranks are allowed they are discouraged.

element.name: NumericValue
element.desc: The numeric equivalent value of the grade.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: The start date from which this version is valid.

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: The end date until which this version is valid.

element.name: Response
element.desc: Learner selection or response in raw format.

element.name: ResponseStatus
element.desc: Status of the response.

element.name: ResponseTime
element.desc: The length of time the learner took to respond.

element.name: Mark
element.desc: The mark achieved for this item as evaluated by the assessment tool at the time of assessment.

element.name: Group
element.desc: The item group within the assessment.

element.name: ItemName
element.desc: Identifies the item on the assessment by name.

element.name: ItemNumber
element.desc: Identifies the item by number on the assessment.

element.name: OrderAsked
element.desc: The order in which the item was asked.

element.name: NumberOfAttempts
element.desc: The number of times a learner changes their answer or attempts a response.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies this response set.

attribute.name: AssessmentResponseComponentRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the assessment response component that the responses are associated with

attribute.name: LearnerPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the Learner for whom these responses are.

attribute.name: AssessmentComponentRefId
attribute.desc: The assessment component that the result is for.

attribute.name: LearnerPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the learner achieving the results.

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: The school at which the assessment was taken.

element.name: AchievementDate
element.desc: The date the results were achieved.

element.name: Result
element.desc: A grade title, a comment, or a mark (dependent on ComponentType of associated aspect). Marks and grades should be valid in the grade set or mark set on the date the assessment was achieved.

element.name: ResultStatus
element.desc: Indicates whether the result is estimated, an interim result, provisional, actual result or a target.

element.name: WorkforcePersonalRefId
element.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies the teacher or staff member who created the result.

element.name: Note
element.desc: Explanatory/usage notes for result.

element.name: LearnerPersonalRefId
element.desc: The ID (GUID) of a learner assigned to take an assessment.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: Start date of the range validity - ranges should not overlap. If not supplied then assumed to have always been valid in the past.

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: End date of the range validity - ranges should not overlap. If not supplied then assumed to always will be valid in the future.

element.name: MinValue
element.desc: The minimum value in the range of marks.

element.name: MaxValue
element.desc: The maximum value in the range of marks.

element.name: WorkforcePersonalRefId
element.desc: The GUID that uniquely identifies a teacher or other staff member responsible for administering or assisting the learner with this assessment.

element.name: Stage
element.desc: The assessed stage (this may well be a Keystage List, but there is no reason why it couldn’t be used for other concepts such as NcYear applicability, Level Exam Level GCSE, A-Level etc.).

value.name: NF_NATIONAL_CURRICULUM_LEVEL_WITH_FINE
value.desc: National Curriculum Level with Fine Grading

value.name: KS4_GCSE__GNVQ__OT_APPROVED_AWARDS_LOCALE_E
value.desc: GCSE / GNVQ / Other Approved Awards (locale: E)

value.name: KS5_A_LEVEL_AS_LEVEL_ADVANCED_GNVQ_OT_ADVANCED
value.desc: A Level/AS Level/Advanced GNVQ/Other Advanced Studies (locale: E)

value.name: Y03_YEAR_3_OPTIONAL_TESTS__TEACHER_ASSESSMENTS
value.desc: Year 3 Optional Tests / Teacher Assessments (locale: E)

value.name: Y04_YEAR_4_OPTIONAL_TESTS__TEACHER_ASSESSMENTS
value.desc: Year 4 Optional Tests / Teacher Assessments (locale: E)

value.name: Y05_YEAR_5_OPTIONAL_TESTS__TEACHER_ASSESSMENTS
value.desc: Year 5 Optional Tests / Teacher Assessments (locale: E)

value.name: Y07_YEAR_7_OPTIONAL_TESTS__TEACHER_ASSESSMENTS
value.desc: Year 7 Optional Tests / Teacher Assessments (locale: E)

value.name: Y08_YEAR_8_OPTIONAL_TESTS__TEACHER_ASSESSMENTS
value.desc: Year 8 Optional Tests / Teacher Assessments (locale: E)

value.name: EAL_ENGLISH_ASADDITIONAL_LANGUAGE_LEVEL_OF
value.desc: English as an Additional Language Level of Acquisition (locale: E)

value.name: SEN_PSCALE_ASSESSMENTSEN_CHILDREN_LOCALE_E
value.desc: P-Scale Assessment for SEN children (locale: E)

value.name: MAT_MATHEMATICS__MATHEMATICAL_DEVELOPMENT_LOCALE_E
value.desc: Mathematics / Mathematical Development (locale: E S W)

element.name: Year
element.desc: A year with which the component grouping is applicable (by convention this is the end year of an academic year eg: 2007/8 resolves to 2008).
